Posts.Content: Aug 11, 2017 06:18PM LA894 wrote: Hi all - This is a big question for me also as I was just diagnosed with bone mets and am a wine lover. My oncologist told me that the studies are flawed so they don't really know for sure. She recommends keeping it to an average of one drink a day (7 per week). That works just fine for me! As a side benefit I am now losing weight as well.
Posts.Title: Wine Metster-Mom Daywalker
